name: Ruby-Newton
short_description: Ruby-Newton is a Ruby wrapper for the NewtonGameDynamics physics engine ( http://newtondynamics.com/ ) It brings object-oriented real-time animated physics simulations to Ruby-enabled applications (e.g. 3D modeling tool with interactive scripting support
